tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.cenozoic_dna: Fragment of DNA from a Cenozoic mammal.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.modern_dna: Genetic material from a modern animal.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.paleozoic_mamma: Extremely rare DNA from a Paleozoic-era mammal.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.frozen_meat: Preserved meat from a long-extinct animal.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.frozen_skin: Ancient skin tissue, still partially intact.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.analyzer: Used to analyze frozen remains and extract DNA.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.synthetizer: Combines DNA fragments into viable genomes.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.dodo_dna: Genetic material of the extinct Dodo.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.aurochs_dna: DNA of the ancient wild ox, the Aurochs.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.thylacine_dna: DNA of the Tasmanian Tiger, extinct marsupial predator.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.passenger_pigeo: Once billions strong, now only DNA remains.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.great_auk_dna: Genetic traces of a flightless seabird.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.stellers_sea_co: From the cold waters of Bering Island.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.quagga_dna: Part zebra, part history. The Quagga returns.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.moa_dna: Colossal bird DNA from ancient New Zealand.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.smilodon_dna: Extracted DNA of the saber-toothed cat, Smilodon.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.mastodon_dna: Prehistoric relative of the elephant – the Mastodon.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.megatherium_dna: DNA from the massive ground sloth, Megatherium.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.kelenken_dna: Genetic traces of the 'Terror Bird' Kelenken.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.doedicurus_dna: DNA of a prehistoric armored glyptodont.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.dimetrodon_dna: DNA of Dimetrodon – a sail-backed synapsid from the Permian.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.edaphosaurus_dn: Fossil DNA from Edaphosaurus, an early herbivorous synapsid.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.casea_dna: Traces of DNA from the squat, bulky Casea.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.eothyris_dna: DNA of the small Permian predator, Eothyris.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.ophiacodon_dna: Fragments of DNA from the little-known Oecistheus.
tooltip.cenozoic_kingdom.permafrost_bloc: A frozen block that may contain prehistoric remains.
